title: CES 2026: Hesai to showcase next-gen lidar for physical AI
description:
Hesai makes advanced lidar sensors, using solid-state technology to guide autonomous vehicles and humanoid robots.

The post CES 2026: Hesai to showcase next-gen lidar for physical AI appeared first on The Robot Report.
